creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
We make shopping smoooth. With Klarna you can buy now and pay later, so you can get what you love today. The Klarna app gives you an overview of your shopping, letting you take control of your personal finances. It also lets you pay your purchases with one click, snooze your payments, and makes returning your products simple and hassle-free.

PAY AS YOU WISH.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – pay now, later or slice it.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make your payment, you can simply snooze any of your purchases directly in the app.

HANDLE YOUR PAYMENTS.
All your payments in one app. Get a complete overview of all your purchases and pay them easily through the app.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

TRY BEFORE YOU BUY.
We make returns hassle-free by letting you quick-select the items you want to send back right in the app, so you don’t have to pay for them in the meantime.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES. Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

JOIN THE DARK SIDE.
The Klarna app is now available in dark mode.

PROBLEMS? NO PROBLEM!
We are at your service in our chat in the app. Feel free to give feedback or reach out if any help needed. We solve your problems and got your back. 99 problems but Klarna ain’t one.

descriptionHtml:
We make shopping smoooth. With Klarna you can buy now and pay later, so you can get what you love today. The Klarna app gives you an overview of your shopping, letting you take control of your personal finances. It also lets you pay your purchases with one tap, snooze your payments, and makes returning your products simple and hassle-free.

PAY AS YOU WISH.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – pay now, later or in instalments. With your credit card or through bank transaction.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make your payment, you can simply extend the due date of your invoice directly in the app.

HANDLE YOUR PAYMENTS.
All your payments in one app. Get a complete overview of all your purchases and pay them easily through the app.

descriptionShort: Buy now and pay later.
title: Klarna | Smoooth shopping online

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
We make shopping smoooth. Experience a better way to shop with everything you need in one app. Get personalised inspiration, exclusive deals and drops and collect the things you like in wish lists with price drop notifications. You can easily manage everything – from snoozing a payment to returning an item – right in the app.

GET PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Select what you’re interested in to get shopping tips in curated wish lists from our experts. From the latest trends, to interior design and the hottest gadgets right now.

ACCESS THE BEST DEALS AND DROPS.
Don’t overpay for the stuff you love. In the Klarna app you can browse weekly deals and discounts from leading retailers.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. Set up price drop alerts for your wish-listed items and be the first to know when they go on sale.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – now, later or in instalments. Get a complete overview of your purchases and pay them easily through the app. You can now pay a single instalment early for added convenience.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make a payment, you can simply snooze any of your purchases directly in the app.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organised? With the Klarna app you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment. <3

JOIN THE DARK SIDE.
The Klarna app is just as smoooth in dark mode if you prefer it.

title: Klarna | Smoooth shopping online

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
We make shopping smoooth. Experience a better way to shop with everything you need in one app. Get personalised inspiration, exclusive deals and drops and collect the things you like in wish lists with price drop notifications. You can easily manage everything – from snoozing a payment to returning an item – right in the app.

GET PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Select what you’re interested in to get shopping tips in curated wish lists from our experts. From the latest trends, to interior design and the hottest gadgets right now.

ACCESS THE BEST DEALS AND DROPS.
Don’t overpay for the stuff you love. In the Klarna app you can browse weekly deals and discounts from leading retailers.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. Set up price drop alerts for your wish-listed items and be the first to know when they go on sale.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – now, later or in instalments. Get a complete overview of your purchases and pay them easily through the app. You can now pay a single instalment early for added convenience.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make a payment, you can simply snooze any of your purchases directly in the app.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organised? With the Klarna app you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment. <3

JOIN THE DARK SIDE.
The Klarna app is just as smoooth in dark mode if you prefer it.

title: Klarna | Smoooth shopping online

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
We make shopping smoooth. Experience a better way to shop with everything you need in one app. Get personalised inspiration, exclusive deals and drops and collect the things you like in wish lists with price drop notifications. You can easily manage everything – from snoozing a payment to returning an item – right in the app.

GET PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Select what you’re interested in to get shopping tips in curated wish lists from our experts. From the latest trends, to interior design and the hottest gadgets right now.

ACCESS THE BEST DEALS AND DROPS.
Don’t overpay for the stuff you love. In the Klarna app you can browse weekly deals and discounts from leading retailers.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. Set up price drop alerts for your wish-listed items and be the first to know when they go on sale.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – now, later or in instalments. Get a complete overview of your purchases and pay them easily through the app. You can now pay a single instalment early for added convenience.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make a payment, you can simply snooze any of your purchases directly in the app.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organised? With the Klarna app you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment. <3

JOIN THE DARK SIDE.
The Klarna app is just as smoooth in dark mode if you prefer it.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
We make shopping smoooth. Experience a better way to shop with everything you need in one app. Get personalised inspiration, exclusive deals and drops and collect the things you like in wish lists with price drop notifications. You can easily manage everything – from snoozing a payment to returning an item – right in the app.

GET PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Select what you’re interested in to get shopping tips in curated wish lists from our experts. From the latest trends, to interior design and the hottest gadgets right now.

ACCESS THE BEST DEALS AND DROPS.
Don’t overpay for the stuff you love. In the Klarna app you can browse weekly deals and discounts from leading retailers.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. Set up price drop alerts for your wish-listed items and be the first to know when they go on sale.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – now, later or in instalments. Get a complete overview of your purchases and pay them easily through the app. You can now pay a single instalment early for added convenience.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make a payment, you can simply snooze any of your purchases directly in the app.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organised? With the Klarna app you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment. <3

JOIN THE DARK SIDE.
The Klarna app is just as smoooth in dark mode if you prefer it.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems. Chat with us in the app and we'll help you!

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Create Wish lists.
Keep track of what you love in one easy place. Browse online stores, pin your favorites, and share your saved items with friends.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

Don’t overpay for the stuff you love. In the Klarna app you can browse weekly deals and discounts from leading retailers.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. Set up price drop alerts for your wish-listed items and be the first to know when they go on sale.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Shop on your own terms and pay as you like – now, later or in instalments. Get a complete overview of your purchases and pay them easily through the app. You can now pay a single instalment early for added convenience.

SNOOZE YOUR PAYMENTS.
If you need more time to make a payment, you can simply snooze any of your purchases directly in the app.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organised? With the Klarna app you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment. <3

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
In Klarna’s Inspiration feed, you’ll find carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Wish lists and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Wish lists with family and friends.

AVOID REMINDER FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Pay later without surprises. When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. And you can even make early payments or extend your due date.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app. Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s shopping like a VIP. Without an annual fee.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Create Wish lists.
Keep track of what you love in one easy place. Browse online stores, pin your favorites, and share your saved items with friends.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP ANYWHERE WITH KLARNA.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Create Wish lists.
Keep track of what you love in one easy place. Browse online stores, pin your favorites, and share your saved items with friends.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Shop smarter with Collections.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP ANYWHERE WITH KLARNA.
When you shop in the Klarna app, you can split the cost of your purchase from any online store into 3 smaller, interest-free payments. And it works just as easily in-store, with Google Pay. So you can get what you love today and pay later.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
In Klarna’s Inspiration feed, you’ll find carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Collections and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Collections with family and friends.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Pay later without surprises. When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. And you can even make early payments or extend your due date.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app. Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s shopping like a VIP. Without an annual fee.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Shop smarter with Collections.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

When you shop in the Klarna app, you can split the cost of your purchase from any online store into 3 smaller, interest-free payments. And it works just as easily in-store, with Google Pay. So you can get what you love today and pay later.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
In Klarna’s Inspiration feed, you’ll find carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Collections and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Collections with family and friends.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Pay later without surprises. When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. And you can even make early payments or extend your due date.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app. Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s shopping like a VIP. Without an annual fee.
descriptionShort: Buy fashion, beauty & tech

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Shop smarter with Collections.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

When you shop in the Klarna app, you can split the cost of your purchase from any online store into 3 smaller, interest-free payments. And it works just as easily in-store, with Google Pay. So you can get what you love today and pay later.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
In Klarna’s Inspiration feed, you’ll find carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Collections and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Collections with family and friends.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Pay later without surprises. When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. And you can even make early payments or extend your due date.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app. Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s shopping like a VIP. Without an annual fee.
descriptionShort: Easy shopping. Try before you buy & Pay later.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems. Chat with us in the app and we'll help you!

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Shop smarter with Collections.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Shop smarter with Collections.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
COMPRA AHORA. PAGA DESPUÉS.
Cuando compras en la app de Klarna, puedes dividir el total de tu compra en cualquier tienda online en 4 pagos más pequeños y sin intereses. Y funciona con la misma facilidad en la tienda, con Google Pay. Para que puedas tener lo que te gusta hoy y pagar después.

NUEVAS OFERTAS TODOS LOS DÍAS.
Compra y ahorra dinero con ofertas y descuentos exclusivos de todo el mundo, directamente en la app de Klarna. Encuentra una oferta que te guste y consíguela con un simple toque. Y vuelve a visitarnos mañana: agregamos nuevas ofertas de compras todo el tiempo.

DESBLOQUEA TU RECOMPENSA DE BIENVENIDA DE $5.
Únete a Vibe, el club de recompensas gratis de Klarna, y obtén recompensas por todas tus compras. Regístrate en la app de Klarna y desbloquea una recompensa de bienvenida de $5 después de completar un solo pago.

SIGUE TODAS TUS ENTREGAS.
Obtén actualizaciones en tiempo real con los tiempos de entrega, códigos de recolección, e incluso fotos de un punto de recolección para guiarte en el camino. Adelante: sigue a ese camión, desde el momento de la compra hasta la recolección en la app de Klarna.

RECIBE AVISOS DE DESCUENTOS.
Crea Listas de Colecciones y espera a que tus favoritos bajen de precio. Cada vez que guardas un artículo, registramos una alerta automática para avisarte si baja de precio. También puedes compartir tus Listas de Colecciones con familiares y amigos.

INSPIRACIÓN PERSONALIZADA.
En la fuente de inspiración de Klarna, encontrarás sugerencias cuidadosamente seleccionadas de ofertas, colecciones de productos, estilos completos y editoriales adaptados a tus compras. No importa si te gusta la moda, la belleza, la tecnología o lo que sea: tenemos algo para ti.

AUMENTA TU LÍMITE DE GASTO.
Cuanto más compres y pagues después en 4 plazos con Klarna y pagues a tiempo, más poder adquisitivo desbloquearás, con lo que podrás gastar más. Además, ¡tendrás acceso a más ofertas exclusivas!

DEVOLUCIONES SENCILLAS.
¿Necesitas devolver algo? Informa de una devolución directamente en la app. Pondremos en pausa tu compra para que no tengas que pagar durante ese tiempo.

ADMINISTRA TUS PAGOS.
Paga más tarde sin sorpresas. Cuando compras con Klarna, tienes una imagen completa de todas tus compras y finanzas. E incluso puedes realizar pagos anticipados o ampliar tu fecha de vencimiento.

CONFIRMACIÓN AL INSTANTE DE TUS COMPRAS.
A nadie le gusta esperar. Cuando compras algo a través de la app de Klarna, verás tu compra unos segundos después de hacer el pedido.

SERVICIO DE ATENCIÓN AL CLIENTE LAS 24 HORAS, LOS 7 DÍAS DE LA SEMANA.
Tendrás servicio las 24 horas del día siempre que lo necesites a través de nuestro chat directamente en la app de Klarna. Prueba las compras sin complicaciones en la app de Klarna. Es comprar como un VIP. Y sin anualidad.

// CA resident loans made or arranged pursuant to a California Financing Law license. //
descriptionShort: Compra en cualquier tienda.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems. Chat with us in the app and we'll help you!

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP ANYWHERE WITH KLARNA.
When you shop in the Klarna app, you can split the cost of your purchase from any online store into 3 smaller, interest-free payments. And it works just as easily in-store, with Google Pay. So you can get what you love today and pay later.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
In Klarna’s Inspiration feed, you’ll find carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Collections and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Collections with family and friends.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Pay later without surprises. When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. And you can even make early payments or extend your due date.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app. Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s shopping like a VIP. Without an annual fee.
descriptionShort: Shop fashion, beauty & tech. Buy now. Pay over time. Manage returns.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
Shop now. Pay later.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

Shop more. Get more.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

Shop smarter with Collections.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

Get price drop alerts.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

Save and share what you love.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

Manage your payments.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

Stay safe.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

Avoid late fees.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

Make hassle-free returns.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

Get help when you need it.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

UNLOCK A $5 WELCOME REWARD.
Join Klarna's free rewards club, and get rewarded for all your shopping. Sign up in the Klarna app and unlock a $5 welcome reward after just 1 complete payment.

SHOP MORE. GET MORE.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

SHOP SMARTER WITH COLLECTIONS.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

AVOID LATE FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

UNLOCK A $5 WELCOME REWARD.
Join Klarna's free rewards club, and get rewarded for all your shopping. Sign up in the Klarna app and unlock a $5 welcome reward after just 1 complete payment.

SHOP MORE. GET MORE.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

SHOP SMARTER WITH COLLECTIONS.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

AVOID LATE FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

UNLOCK A $5 WELCOME REWARD.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 point for every $1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a $5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member.

SHOP MORE. GET MORE.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

SHOP SMARTER WITH COLLECTIONS.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

AVOID LATE FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
descriptionShort: All your shopping in one app.
title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP ANYWHERE WITH KLARNA.
When you shop in the Klarna app, you can split the cost of your purchase from any online store into 3 smaller, interest-free payments. And it works just as easily in-store, with Google Pay. So you can get what you love today and pay later.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
In Klarna’s Inspiration feed, you’ll find carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Collections and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Collections with family and friends.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Pay later without surprises. When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. And you can even make early payments or extend your due date.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app. Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s shopping like a VIP. Without an annual fee.
descriptionShort: Shop fashion, beauty & tech. Buy now. Pay over time. Manage returns.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

UNLOCK A $5 WELCOME REWARD.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 point for every $1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a $5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member.

SHOP MORE. GET MORE.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

SHOP SMARTER WITH COLLECTIONS.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

AVOID LATE FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SMOOOTH SHOPPING AT YOUR FAVOURITE STORES.
Discover stores where you can split the costs of your purchases. We partner with retailers all over the world so you can experience smoooth shopping directly through their sites. And if anything goes wrong with your Klarna order—whether it’s physical goods or services—we’ve got your back.

- “Definitely the best app I have come across combining finance and shopping..” - Jade

HOW DOES KLARNA WORK?
• Download the Klarna app and sign up or log in.
• Buy now, pay later online and in-store.
• Pause your payment if there’s something wrong with your purchase.
• Join our rewards club for free, and collect points to unlock amazing perks.
• Discover personalised inspiration and exclusive deals and discounts.
• Get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances.
• And much more!

- “This is the best buy now pay later system. It has helped me save money too, thank you Klarna” - D.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world. Find and claim deals you like with a simple tap. Make sure to check back in tomorrow – we add new deals and discounts all the time.

UNLOCK REWARDS.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 vibe for every £1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a £5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member. Get new rewards after every 500 points.

DISCOVER THE KLARNA CARD.
With Klarna’s physical card, you get up to 30 days to pay when you shop online, in-store, at home or abroad. The Klarna card is a flexible alternative to credit cards that gives you the freedom to make the most of your budget. Link it to Google Pay to pay easily by tapping your mobile phone or smartwatch.

- ”This is the best source available to pay over time w/o using a credit card.” - Patrice

- “Better than using my actual credit card” - Marlow

INSTANT ORDER CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you’ll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order. Whether you decided to pay later or immediately.

DELIVERY TRACKING.
Get instant delivery information and track parcels from store to door.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. With pay later, we’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Get carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in collections and save money through price drop alerts. Each time you save an item in a collection, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your collections with family and friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
With Klarna, you choose exactly how much you want to pay and when. There's a flexible payment method that works with your budget, wherever you shop. Whether you choose to pay now, split your purchase or pay later, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. You can even make early payments or extend your due date.

“Best Buy Now Pay Later App” - Leely

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

STAY SAFE WHILE SHOPPING.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

* Trusted by 147+ million users *

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock customer service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app.
descriptionShort: Discover, share and get the best deals at Klarna stores. All in the Klarna app.

descriptionShort: Shop fashion, beauty & tech. Buy now. Pay over time. Manage returns.
title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SMOOOTH SHOPPING AT YOUR FAVOURITE STORES.
Discover stores where you can split the costs of your purchases. We partner with retailers all over the world so you can experience smoooth shopping directly through their sites. And if anything goes wrong with your Klarna order—whether it’s physical goods or services—we’ve got your back.

- “Definitely the best app I have come across combining finance and shopping..” - Jade

HOW DOES KLARNA WORK?
• Download the Klarna app and sign up or log in.
• Buy now, pay later online and in-store.
• Pause your payment if there’s something wrong with your purchase.
• Join our rewards club for free, and collect points to unlock amazing perks.
• Discover personalised inspiration and exclusive deals and discounts.
• Get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances.
• And much more!

- “This is the best buy now pay later system. It has helped me save money too, thank you Klarna” - D.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world. Find and claim deals you like with a simple tap. Make sure to check back in tomorrow – we add new deals and discounts all the time.

UNLOCK REWARDS.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 vibe for every £1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a £5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member. Get new rewards after every 500 points.

DISCOVER THE KLARNA CARD.
With Klarna’s physical card, you get up to 30 days to pay when you shop online, in-store, at home or abroad. The Klarna card is a flexible alternative to credit cards that gives you the freedom to make the most of your budget. Link it to Google Pay to pay easily by tapping your mobile phone or smartwatch.

- ”This is the best source available to pay over time w/o using a credit card.” - Patrice

- “Better than using my actual credit card” - Marlow

INSTANT ORDER CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you’ll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order. Whether you decided to pay later or immediately.

DELIVERY TRACKING.
Get instant delivery information and track parcels from store to door.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. With pay later, we’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Get carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in collections and save money through price drop alerts. Each time you save an item in a collection, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your collections with family and friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
With Klarna, you choose exactly how much you want to pay and when. There's a flexible payment method that works with your budget, wherever you shop. Whether you choose to pay now, split your purchase or pay later, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. You can even make early payments or extend your due date.

“Best Buy Now Pay Later App” - Leely

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

STAY SAFE WHILE SHOPPING.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

* Trusted by 147+ million users *

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock customer service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app.
descriptionShort: Discover, share and get the best deals at Klarna stores. All in the Klarna app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems. Chat with us in the app and we'll help you!

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

UNLOCK A $5 WELCOME REWARD.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 point for every $1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a $5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member.

SHOP MORE. GET MORE.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

SHOP SMARTER WITH COLLECTIONS.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

AVOID LATE FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SMOOOTH SHOPPING AT YOUR FAVOURITE STORES.
Discover stores where you can split the costs of your purchases. We partner with retailers all over the world so you can experience smoooth shopping directly through their sites. And if anything goes wrong with your Klarna order—whether it’s physical goods or services—we’ve got your back.

- “Definitely the best app I have come across combining finance and shopping..” - Jade

HOW DOES KLARNA WORK?
• Download the Klarna app and sign up or log in.
• Buy now, pay later online and in-store.
• Pause your payment if there’s something wrong with your purchase.
• Join our rewards club for free, and collect points to unlock amazing perks.
• Discover personalised inspiration and exclusive deals and discounts.
• Get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances.
• And much more!

- “This is the best buy now pay later system. It has helped me save money too, thank you Klarna” - D.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world. Find and claim deals you like with a simple tap. Make sure to check back in tomorrow – we add new deals and discounts all the time.

UNLOCK REWARDS.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 vibe for every £1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a £5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member. Get new rewards after every 500 points.

DISCOVER THE KLARNA CARD.
With Klarna’s physical card, you get up to 30 days to pay when you shop online, in-store, at home or abroad. The Klarna card is a flexible alternative to credit cards that gives you the freedom to make the most of your budget. Link it to Google Pay to pay easily by tapping your mobile phone or smartwatch.

- ”This is the best source available to pay over time w/o using a credit card.” - Patrice

- “Better than using my actual credit card” - Marlow

INSTANT ORDER CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you’ll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order. Whether you decided to pay later or immediately.

DELIVERY TRACKING.
Get instant delivery information and track parcels from store to door.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. With pay later, we’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Get carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in collections and save money through price drop alerts. Each time you save an item in a collection, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your collections with family and friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
With Klarna, you choose exactly how much you want to pay and when. There's a flexible payment method that works with your budget, wherever you shop. Whether you choose to pay now, split your purchase or pay later, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. You can even make early payments or extend your due date.

“Best Buy Now Pay Later App” - Leely

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

STAY SAFE WHILE SHOPPING.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

* Trusted by 147+ million users *

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock customer service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app.
descriptionShort: Discover, share and get the best deals at Klarna stores. All in the Klarna app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems. Chat with us in the app and we'll help you!

descriptionHtml:
SHOP FLEXIBLY WITH KLARNA.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a simple tap. And check back in tomorrow – we add new shopping offers all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES.
Get instant information on your purchases and track them from store to door.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in Collections and never pay full price again. Each time you save an item, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your Collections with family and friends.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SMOOOTH SHOPPING AT YOUR FAVOURITE STORES.
Discover stores where you can split the costs of your purchases. We partner with retailers all over the world so you can experience smoooth shopping directly through their sites. And if anything goes wrong with your Klarna order—whether it’s physical goods or services—we’ve got your back.

- “Definitely the best app I have come across combining finance and shopping..” - Jade

HOW DOES KLARNA WORK?
• Download the Klarna app and sign up or log in.
• Buy now, pay later online and in-store.
• Pause your payment if there’s something wrong with your purchase.
• Join our rewards club for free, and collect points to unlock amazing perks.
• Discover personalised inspiration and exclusive deals and discounts.
• Get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances.
• And much more!

- “This is the best buy now pay later system. It has helped me save money too, thank you Klarna” - D.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save money with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world. Find and claim deals you like with a simple tap. Make sure to check back in tomorrow – we add new deals and discounts all the time.

UNLOCK REWARDS.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 vibe for every £1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a £5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member. Get new rewards after every 500 points.

DISCOVER THE KLARNA CARD.
With Klarna’s physical card, you get up to 30 days to pay when you shop online, in-store, at home or abroad. The Klarna card is a flexible alternative to credit cards that gives you the freedom to make the most of your budget. Link it to Google Pay to pay easily by tapping your mobile phone or smartwatch.

- ”This is the best source available to pay over time w/o using a credit card.” - Patrice

- “Better than using my actual credit card” - Marlow

INSTANT ORDER CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through the Klarna app, you’ll see your purchase just seconds after you place your order. Whether you decided to pay later or immediately.

DELIVERY TRACKING.
Get instant delivery information and track parcels from store to door.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. With pay later, we’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

PERSONALISED INSPIRATION.
Get carefully curated suggestions for deals, product collections, complete looks, and editorials tailored to your shopping. It doesn’t matter if you love fashion, beauty, tech, or whatever – we’ve got something for you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Save items in collections and save money through price drop alerts. Each time you save an item in a collection, an automatic price drop alert is set. That way, when the price drops you will know. You can also share your collections with family and friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
With Klarna, you choose exactly how much you want to pay and when. There's a flexible payment method that works with your budget, wherever you shop. Whether you choose to pay now, split your purchase or pay later, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and finances. You can even make early payments or extend your due date.

“Best Buy Now Pay Later App” - Leely

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT.
Stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

STAY SAFE WHILE SHOPPING.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

* Trusted by 147+ million users *

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Get round-the-clock customer service whenever you need it using our chat right in the Klarna app.
descriptionShort: Discover, share and get the best deals at Klarna stores. All in the Klarna app.

title: Klarna | Shop now. Pay later.

creator: Klarna Bank AB (publ)
descriptionHtml:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
With Klarna, you can choose to pay in 4 payments. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time.

UNLOCK A $5 WELCOME REWARD.
Join Klarna rewards club for free to get rewarded for all your shopping. Earn 1 point for every $1 spent. Plus, take advantage of member perks like deals and exclusives, and get a $5 welcome reward as soon as you complete your first purchase as a member.

SHOP MORE. GET MORE.
The more often you pay in 4 with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock.

SHOP SMARTER WITH COLLECTIONS.
Get your shopping ideas in order by saving your faves from any store to collections in the Klarna app. Share them to make a fashion statement, or to get what you really want. No more useless gifts. And let our experts spark your inspiration with shopping tips in curated collections tailored to you.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

SAVE AND SHARE WHAT YOU LOVE.
Keep track of everything you want. Browse online stores, pin your favourites and share your saved items with friends.

MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases and payments. You can now pay a single installment early for added convenience.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN.

AVOID LATE FEES.
Never miss a payment and stay on top of your finances by activating push notification reminders.

MAKE HASSLE-FREE RETURNS.
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

GET HELP WHEN YOU NEED IT.
Chat with our customer support whenever you need help. Or if you just want to give feedback. Everyone loves a compliment.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app, it’s a game changer.
